actions.name: Show options
actions.description: Show the available options to open a given URL.

parameters.name: allow-auto-open
parameters.description: Set to ”false” to make the app not perform any automatic actions on launch.

actions.name: Show Store Product Details
actions.description: Shows the details of an iTunes product within Opener (or Opener's action extension if open) in an ”SKStoreProductViewController” or an iOS store app.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A numeric iTunes identifier for the product.
